name: Boost 95
description:
Press space to boost. Press A to rotate left. Press D to rotate right. Find your way to the green landing pad. Press the blue fullscreen button in the bottom right for the best experience!

Thanks to Ben and Rick over at Udemy/Gamedev.tv for their Complete 3D Unity Dev course, it rocks. I made this almost entirely from scratch (thanks Rick for the sounds!) and I'm proud to have this uploaded to itch.io. Please give me any and all feedback you have!
